item.description:
Hi my friend Vicky is doing the 3 Day Susan G Komen Walk at the end of July , so to raise funds I thought we could have a beginners crochet class which Vicky and maybe her daughter will teach . 

To  make it FUN I will bring a bottle of wine and cheese .

 So people who would like to learn crochet  and help raise money for my friends 3day /60mile Walk  its a Win Win for us all! 

And we can feel good while doing it!

What :  beginners crochet class

Supplies to bring: You'd need a ball of yarn and a size g  crochet hook.( I will have one or two extra hooks ).

Cost: suggested donation of $5 or more always welcomed. Can use link below or bring cash or check.

My friend, Vicky Hu, is doing  The Susan G. Komen 3-Day/60 Mile walk between July 27 and July 29. Her friend, former coworker  Jen Yong was diagnosed with "intermediate" IIB stage"Breast Cancer last November and have since completed 2 rounds of chemo. She's schedule to do surgery  (June 11th) and then under go radiation, then more surgery and reconstructive surgery after.

She has been very stressed and yet brave. She has a strong support group that have been helping her along the way. She is young and is strong and will fight this.

On Vicky's end, in order to walk, she has to raise at least $2300. She's so far at mid-point. We are setting up some fun activities to raise money for the walk and this is where you come on.

Please donate directly online on her page: http://www.the3day.org/goto/vicky . If you're unable to donate online, you can make a check out payable to Susan G Komen Walk, or just bring cash.

Lastly, if you are interested in reading about Jen's progress, you can read it here: http://btwuhavecancerjen.blogspot.com/2011/12/goddamned-f-cancer.html

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: Beginning Crochet Class / FUNdraiser for Susan G Komen 3 Day Walk
